item.title: Version 1.1.12
item.description: Bug Fixes. News Section Scroll Issue: On certain devices, the news content was scrolling behind the bottom menu, making it partially unreadable. This issue has been identified and resolved. The content now scrolls properly without overlapping the menu bar.

item.title: Version 1.1.12
item.description: Bug Fixes. News Section Scroll Issue: On certain devices, the news content was scrolling behind the bottom menu, making it partially unreadable. This issue has been identified and resolved. The content now scrolls properly without overlapping the menu bar.
